location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Kaye, Auditor of Civil Accounts at Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from John Kaye, Auditor of Civil Accounts at Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting a 'List of Pensions Receipts' paid by the Residency for the month of July 1813 and a 'List of pay & Establishment Receipts' due to the Resident for July 1813.
